LanguageData.BD_BoltActionRifle.label: Bori bolt action rifle
LanguageData.BD_BoltActionRifle.description: A standard Bori rifle. It is more powerful, more accurate, and lighter than regular rifles.
LanguageData.BD_BoltActionRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BD_BoltActionRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BD_BoltActionRifle.label: bolt action rifle bullet
LanguageData.BD_LightWeightedBoltActionRifle.label: Bori lightweight bolt action rifle
LanguageData.BD_LightWeightedBoltActionRifle.descript: A lightweight bolt action rifle made quickly from simple materials. Despite its rudimentary origins, it's proven to be a reliable weapon that has protected many Bori and Sheepawn communities.
LanguageData.BD_LightWeightedBoltActionRifle.verbs.Ve: Bori light weight bolt action rifle
LanguageData.BD_SdangSMG.label: Bori submachine gun
LanguageData.BD_SdangSMG.description: A submachine gun made in the Bori-style. It is well-known for turning an enemy to mince meat at a moment's notice.
LanguageData.BD_SdangSMG.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.BD_SdangSMG.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.BD_SdangSMG.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Bori submachine gun
LanguageData.Bullet_SdangSMG.label: machine gun bullet
LanguageData.BD_MtHeavyMachineGun.label: Bori machine gun (stationary)
LanguageData.BD_MtHeavyMachineGun.description: A machine gun that is capable of firing countless bullets in quick succession. It boasts outstanding combat performance. This Bori machine gun is lighter than a regular machine gun and capable of being carried, but who would think it's a good idea to carry and fire such a heavy weapon? How would you hold and aim it at the same time？
LanguageData.BD_MtHeavyMachineGun.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BD_MtHeavyMachineGun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_MtHMG.label: machine gun bullet
LanguageData.BD_GrenadeFrag.label: Bori sticky grenade
LanguageData.BD_GrenadeFrag.description: A sticky grenade used by the Imperial Guard to destroy the enemy's powerful exoskeleton during the Hundred Years' War. Do not use on battlefield where military dogs are deployed.
LanguageData.BD_GrenadeFrag.verbs.0.label: sticky grenade
LanguageData.Proj_BR_Fr.label: Bori sticky grenade
LanguageData.BD_AssaultRifle.label: Bori assault rifle
LanguageData.BD_AssaultRifle.description: A standard assault rifle. It was the official weapon of Eden's resistance during the Hundred Years' War. It has relatively long range and a short rate of fire because it was made using a bullpup, but it has low accuracy.\n\n"Your task is simple. Fire. Destroy the enemy and bloody up the battlefield."
LanguageData.BD_AssaultRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BD_AssaultRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.BD_AssaultRifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Bori assault rifle
LanguageData.Bullet_BR_Assault.label: assault rifle bullet
LanguageData.BD_Autopistol.label: ceremonial pistol
LanguageData.BD_Autopistol.description: This pistol was issued as a ceremonial weapon to the commanders of Tobem's military on Eden. Despite its gorgeous appearance, it has all its basic functions, so it can be traded with collectors for a hefty price.\n\n"This is an order. Don't kill yourself. Fight and die with honor. I plan on doing the same."
LanguageData.BD_Autopistol.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.BD_Autopistol.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.BD_Autopistol.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: ceremonial pistol
LanguageData.BD_Claymore.label: Bori claymore
LanguageData.BD_Claymore.description:
A long, two-handed sword that matches historical records of similar weapons on Eden. Disregarded as impractical during the Hundred Years' War, as the war neared its end, a soldier picked up a claymore and fought to the end, achieving legendary feats before finally falling. It has since been widely praised as the weapon of the unsung hero.

"I'm out of bullets. I'll fight with this sword instead. I have one final wish. To die in battle."

"Unbelievable, this fucking dog is begging for mercy."

"I'm not so lowly. If we have to be the playthings of uncaring gods, then let's play! Until our final breath!"
LanguageData.BD_Claymore.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.BD_Claymore.tools.1.label: tip
LanguageData.BD_Claymore.tools.2.label: blade
LanguageData.BD_halberd.label: Bori halberd
LanguageData.BD_halberd.description: A weapon that combines a spear and an axe. It's perfect for breaking through hard helmets or bug exoskeletons. It's not a weapon that's native to Eden, but after the ant-like aliens invaded, the Bori took up the weapons of the fallen aliens.\n\n"There are traces of the enemy's exoskeleton left behind on the weapon. This is proof of its effectiveness."
LanguageData.BD_halberd.tools.0.label: shaft
LanguageData.BD_halberd.tools.1.label: halberd tip
LanguageData.BD_halberd.tools.2.label: axe
LanguageData.BD_Spear.label: Bori spear
LanguageData.BD_Spear.description: A primitive spear. After signing the Refugee Relief and Relocation Act, Bori and Sheepawns were scattered across the rimworld, and took up spears as they began their nomadic lifestyle. This spear possesses excellent penetration capabilities and is relatively easy to make.\n\n"They are everywhere. No matter what, I have to protect this nest."
LanguageData.BD_Spear.tools.0.label: shaft
LanguageData.BD_Spear.tools.1.label: tip
LanguageData.BD_AutoBoltActionRifle.label: Bori auto bolt action rifle
LanguageData.BD_AutoBoltActionRifle.description:
A modified Imperial Guard bolt action rifle that has rapid fire capabilities. It fires high-penetration bullets in rapid succession, but it has low accuracy. Nevertheless, it has incredible destructive potential.

"The bullets can tear through iron plates with ease. It's a waste to fire at unarmored targets."

"I mean, the enemies are like ants. This could be used to pierce their exoskeletons."

"I suppose that's true. Well then, feel free to destroy the little bastards."
LanguageData.BD_AutoBoltActionRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BD_AutoBoltActionRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.BD_Sniper.label: Bori sniper rifle
LanguageData.BD_Sniper.description: A standard sniper rifle used by the Imperial Guard. The gun is comprised of wooden and matte metal components to reduce visibility from a distance. Due to its high production cost and complex creation process, it was rarely used as the Hundred Years' War neared its end. However, it's beautiful design and good combat performance make it quite popular among collectors.\n\n"I inherited this rifle from my teacher, who inherited it from their teacher. And soon you will inherit it."
LanguageData.BD_Sniper.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BD_Sniper.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.BD_Sniper.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Bori sniper rifle
LanguageData.Bullet_BD_Sniper.label: sniper rifle bullet
LanguageData.BD_HeavySMG.label: Bori heavy submachine gun
LanguageData.BD_HeavySMG.description: A heavy submachine gun used by the Imperial Guard. It's surprisingly lightweight and portable, sporting excellent durability and an elegant appearance.\n\n"It's like a sprinkler. Raining down bullets like water drops."
LanguageData.BD_HeavySMG.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.BD_HeavySMG.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.BD_HeavySMG.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Bori heavy submachine gun
LanguageData.Bullet_BD_HeavySMG.label: heavy submachine gun bullet
LanguageData.BD_ChargeLance.label: Bori charge lance
LanguageData.BD_ChargeLance.description: A powerful charge lance that utilizes electromagnetic charges to fire powerful projectiles. It is very effective against mechanoids.
LanguageData.BD_ChargeLance.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.BD_ChargeLance.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Bori charge lance
LanguageData.Bullet_BD_ChargeLance.label: charge lance bullet
LanguageData.BD_ChargeRifle.label: Bori charge rifle
LanguageData.BD_ChargeRifle.description: A powerful charge rifle that utilizes electromagnetic charges to fire powerful projectiles. It is very effective against mechanoids.
LanguageData.BD_ChargeRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BD_ChargeRifle.tools.1.label: bayonet
LanguageData.BD_ChargeRifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Bori charge rifle
LanguageData.BD_ChargeSMG.label: Bori charge submachine gun
LanguageData.BD_ChargeSMG.description: A powerful charge submachine gun that utilizes electromagnetic charges to fire powerful projectiles. It is very effective against mechanoids.
LanguageData.BD_ChargeSMG.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.BD_ChargeSMG.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.BD_ChargeSMG.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Bori charge submachine gun
LanguageData.Bullet_BD_ChargeSMG.label: charge SMG bullet
LanguageData.SP_Staff.label: Sheepawn modern cane
LanguageData.SP_Staff.description: A modern cane made for Sheepawn to improve their naturally slow movement speed. It is an effective weapon for self-defense in emergencies and helps with animal training.
LanguageData.SP_Staff.tools.0.label: shaft
LanguageData.SP_Staff.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.SP_Staff_Wood.label: Sheepawn wooden cane
LanguageData.SP_Staff_Wood.description: A wooden cane made for Sheepawn to improve their naturally slow movement speed and helps with animal training. Due to its crude appearance and simplistic production, it is often overlooked as a weapon. However, this can be used to the wielder's advantage by attacking while the enemy has their guard down.
LanguageData.SP_Staff_Wood.tools.0.label: shaft
LanguageData.SP_Staff_Wood.tools.1.label: head
